amendment.description: To end unemployment payments to jobless millionaires.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2372 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(e) of the Congressional Budget Act withdrawn in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2372.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(e) of the Congressional Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2372.
Amendment SA 2372 proposed by Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 2360. To end unemployment payments to jobless millionaires.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2372 proposed by Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 2360.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2372 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
